mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.pic, u.created_at, u.uid, u.nick_name, COUNT(f.feed_id) AS feed_count, SUM(f.all_feed_like_count) AS all_feed_like_count FROM user u JOIN ( SELECT f.feed_id, f.write_user_id, COUNT(fl.feed_id) AS all_feed_like_count FROM feed f LEFT JOIN feed_like fl ON fl.feed_id = f.feed_id GROUP BY f.feed_id ) f ON f.write_user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{profileUserId} GROUP BY u.user_id
